description: Retrospective application for installation of decking to forecourt at front of coffee/deli shop with surrounding dwarf timber framed and clad wall 1.0 m high.
decision_conditions: The proposed development by virtue of its size, siting and design would create an incongruous addition to the host property and the streetscene that would be visually intrusive and detract from the character and appearance of the host property and the surrounding area.  Therefore the proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

Condition 5 - Arboricultural Method Statement and Tree Protection PlanThe applicant has submitted a Tree Survey, Arboricultural Impact Assessment, Arboricultural Method Statement and Tree Protection Plan to discharge this condition. The Council's Tree Officer has reviewed and is satisfied with the details submitted. As such, this condition can be discharged in full.
The description in the application form shows loft conversion, whereas the proposed west elevation shows single storey rear extension also. Please clarify and amend the drawings as required.
